Posts.Content: hi Jacster.............I had my mastectomy on the 6th Oct and  had my drain in for 3 weeks.;  all removed now and everything ok.
Posts.Title: Still Bleeding .....

Posts.Content: Hiya   I was diagnosed on 30th Aug. I will begin my treatment in Oct. My first post was I feel overwhelmed and lost.  Just by joining this forum at the outset of my diagnosis I have received some great advice and support.  Good luck! No doubt in the future we will be giving people who have just been diagnosed the support they will need.
Posts.Title: Hi im newly diagnosed with invasive breast cancer, scared and looking...
